title: L0L COACHING
body:
Hello, im Grimzz, I am a Platinum mid/ADC main.
I have recently been injured and am currently coaching.
I am not the greatest player, i just want to help people learn, Also I am unsure if this post is allowed, if not i will take it down.
http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=42582

Thanks and have a good night - Grimzz{{champion:238}}

replies.body: We have to pay money!?!?!?! If that's the case im pretty sure that his post is not allowed

Just offer 1/2 hour - 15 min custom games for people not sure about your service (for free of course) and if they feel you are a valuable help then that should sway them to committing (also maybe make it 2 hours paid and 3rd free)... 1/2 - 15 min only for the first time though lol.
